name: Bubbles (itch) (ManoJoaoPM)
description:
It's a simple game with simple mechanics.

Info: 

If the bubble pass the screen border, it will burst.

If the bubble touch a leaf, will burst.

Your life bar is on bottom of game. It's decreasing every time, so you must get soap for survive. Soaps will spawn in 10 seconds, you can reduce the timer with upgrade. You can buy upgrade when die.

Has OH Upgrade.ITt's basically the value that soap will increase in your life. Buy the upgrade and survive more, and more. Good Luck!!
